name: Project: Relocation
description:
Description

Project : Relocation is a short Survival adventure/ Horror, set in an abandoned soviet bunker in 2001 where internal intelligence registered unusual magnetic impulse, and sent your main character to investigate the cause, the rest is for player to discover

Features

- Full diegetic in-game interface, all UI functions are implemented in your PDA

- True first person, animated, voiced player character

- Fairly detailed environment

- Fully dynamic lighting

I don't really want to spoil the rest

There are optional items and easter eggs in the game, if you don't want to rush it

Made by: Dimensional Games

Showdoze - Lead project development

Lacane - Additional modelling, game design, Ui design

Special thanks to - SwordmanCK, Looking Glass Studios, Epic Games, Valve Software, Crowbar Collective, and a lot of people from Sketchfab
